name: deep-loop
description: Autonomous deep development loop with 16 edge case handlers, RLM support, and browser E2E testing
author: Marcus Gollahon

deep.description: Enter deep craftsman mode with deterministic PLAN -> BUILD -> REVIEW -> FIX loop. Auto-triages complexity and uses Internal Ralph v4.0 for parallel task execution.

deep-cleanup.description: Manually clean up stale temp files from deep loop sessions

start-ralph.description: Create PRD backlog and enter ralph mode for autonomous task processing

cancel-ralph.description: Cancel ralph mode by completing/skipping all PRD tasks

cancel-deep.description: Cancel an active deep loop session

deep-status.description: Display current deep loop session status

diagnose-hooks.description: Troubleshoot Claude Code hook errors (PreToolUse, PostToolUse, etc.)

code-simplifier.description: Simplifies code after BUILD phase - removes complexity. Invoke via Task tool.

verify-app.description: E2E verification before COMPLETE - browser or CLI testing.

run-verification.description: Background verification agent for quality checks.

rlm-explorer.description: RLM-style codebase exploration for large repos (>5000 files).

browser-test.description: Browser-based E2E testing using Claude-in-Chrome MCP tools.

conflict-resolver.description: AI-powered git merge conflict resolution for Ralph mode.
